Configure
Note:
  -Guidance @ https://docs.reltio.com/configapi/configurationapi.html?hl=configuration%2Capi
  -L1 is Reltio Core
  -L2 is Reltio Industry Specific Verticals, where accelerators are implemented
  -L3 are Customer Extensions that are extended by customer
  -inheritance across the layers using JSON. Use "extendsTypeURI" name in the JSON to extend. 
Pre-conditions:
  -Only the L3 level of Reltio is configuratable via the Configuration API
Main Success Scenario:
  1.xxx:fill in
